title: Unified folder marking read/unread incorrectly
content:
Tb 115 for various sub-releases, multiple domains/mail-boxes, all IMAP, unified folder, date-sequence, threaded.

When a new message arrives which is threaded with messages previously read, it is correctly noted as 'Unread'. This should change when it is read. In this set-up, from bold to normal-weight. Working correctly!

When the thread is closed-up, the original message is displayed, either with an underline or in normal/'read' font, accordingly.

In the Unified folder, reading all of the messages still leaves the underline indicator of 'something new'.

In the individual InBox folder (organised, as above/identically) the closed-up thread is properly displayed, ie without underline.

Re-starting Tb will correct the display in the Unified folder.

Please advise if coding issue or a setting that is incorrect?
creator: firefox2512

title: T'bird Opening Page stuck. Newest message dated 11/18/23, I can't dislodge the page - T'bird v115.6.0 on OS 13.6.3
content:
Hopefully nearing the end of a long saga. Used Comcast email and T'bird for many years. In November I wanted to add a new address to Comcast and that's when my troubles began - it was like quicksand: passwords, and more passwords etc. it became worse and worse and ... worse! I gave up on Comcast and opened Yahoo and iCloud email addresses and engaged Apple Mail. I've used Macs since about 1985 and used individual apps for browsing, mail, office suite etc. I'm used to having an "Address Book" as part of a mail program; Apple Mail has no address book their Mail reads "Contacts" for an address - very nice if one is using an iPhone but not so on my desktop Mac - so I return to Thunderbird which I'm used to. We oldies single task - it's like driving 25 MPH.

Today Matt helped with the correct authentication method to get my T'bird logged on to Yahoo, now to the rest of it:

I need to unfreeze T'bird's opening page which shows a Nov. 18 email as the newest message - I can't click the page away, only scroll to older messages. I sent myself a message today but it doesn't appear as a received message. Could the Mailbox be at capacity? I'm running T'bird v115.6.0 on Mac OS 13.6.3 and it was OK until I poked the hornets' nest.

Any thoughts are appreciated
creator: return335

title: Inbox puzzle
content:
I've just installed Thunderbird - which I have been using for years on my desktop and laptop - on my wife's laptop. 

No matter what I try, I cannot locate the inbox.  I'm instructed to right-click on the account name in the folders panel, but the account name isn't there. I'm offered only Mail, Address Book, Tasks and Chat.  Right-clicking on the Mail option offers Open In New Tab, Open In New Window and Switch To.

I can write and send an email, choosing either of two accounts, but I can't seen incoming/received ones. I have a feeling that I'm going to be embarrassed by the answer, but I'm stumped.
creator: Peasoft

title: mail goes into trash as unread, empty and the date as 1-1-1970
content: Since a few weeks the following problem occurs when I use Thunderbird: When I delete emails from the inbox or the sent items, some emails do not end up in the trash box in the normal way. These now appear in the trash box as unread, with the date as 1-1-1970 and the file size as 0 kb. When I click on them they are empty and when I move them back to the inbox they remain empty. These emails have therefore disappeared permanently. It does not happen with all mails, but I don't see any similarity in the emails that cause this problem. I have not made any changes to my computer in the past period, except for the automatic Windows 10 updates. Hopefully someone knows what is causing this and how it can be resolved.
creator: tdl23

title: Reenvio de mail
content:
Hola Foro, Cuando se lanzó la versión Supernova, se me actualizó automáticamente y vi que una opción muy utilizada por mi dejó de funcionar. Yo utilizo Ctrl+L para reenviar mail de esta forma, selecciono 8 mail (ese es el máximo que permiten las versiones anteriores), luego aprieto Ctrl+L y a continuación se abren 8 ventanas de reenvío, al las cuales les voy poniendo la cuenta a la que quiero reenviar y aprieto Ctrl+Enter para que se reenvíen. Veo que con la primer versión de Supernova, por más que seleccione 8 mail, no se abren las 8 ventanas de reenvío, obligándome a tener que reenviar uno por uno. Por suerte pude volver a mi versión anterior (102.15.1) desde el backup del día anterior.

Alguno sabe si esta funcionalidad, fue corregida (en caso que sea un bug) o discontinuada?

Desde ya, muchas gracias
creator: daniel294

title: Thunderbird redownloads all messages in one folder after any crash
content:
Sometimes Thunderbird gets killed (e.g. by gnome-shell or my system crashing).

When that happens, it always redownloads one of my folders, but not others. It is the biggest one, though (3GB), aside from Inbox (which is 4GB at the moment). The other two biggest folders are ~1GB in size.

All the settings for them are the same (Include in search results; Check this folder when getting new messages; Retention policy: use account settings; Synchronization: Select this folder for offline use, Personal Folder: no sharing; Storage well below Quota -- 33%).

Also at some point I was seeing text like: Downloading message header 10887 / 7162 in <...>, which seemed like another problem (that was after I opened the folder while it was downloading, so it started to pull in message headers separately in parallel).

I've tried "Repair Folder", and it seemed good, but the problem was back after the next crash.
creator: dmitry12

title: pc wake-up results in T-bird window shrinkage or disappearance.
content:
Edition Windows 10 Home Version 21H2 Installed on ‎9/‎25/‎2020 OS build 19044.3086 Experience Windows Feature Experience Pack 1000.19041.1000.0 Thunderbird 115.6.0 (32-bit)

PC awakened after > 1 hr sleep time frequently (>20%) results in the Thunderbird window coming back as either smaller than a postage stamp in the upper LH corner of the screen or not displaying at all. In the former case, the window can be stretched back to size and repositioned but it is annoying. In the latter case, Thunderbird must be closed and restarted. On restart, the postage stamp window appears and has to be resized. On a normal Thunderbird start up, after the computer was properly shut down and restarted, the Thunderbird mail window opens properly. Thunderbird is the only app that has this problem. Is this a bug? Can it be remedied with some setting?
creator: srdarstein

title: New email account does not run enabled filters when fetching mail before junk classification
content:
Running Tbird Supernova stable 115.6.0 under Win10 stable. I added a new email account with a new provider which uses TLS/SSL (last below Local Folders). All Folders shows:

> [Mail] Brian DOT Inglis AT Shaw DOT ca - (POP3/SMTP) > [Mail] BWInglis AT Shaw DOT ca - (POP3/SMTP) > [Folder] Local Folders > [S/Mail] Brian DOT Inglis AT SystematicSW DOT ab DOT ca - (POP3 TLS/SMTP SSL)

The accounts have only the standard folders, everything is filtered or moved into Local Folders. I have been adding email filters as usual using Message/Create Filter from Message, with Run Manually and When Fetching Mail (before Junk...) enabled. My previously added accounts (above Local Folders) filters run automatically.

The new account still leaves everything in its Inbox! I have to select all messages in the Unified (or account) Inbox, and run Tools/Filters/select each filter (enabled)/Run Now to move the messages to the appropriate Local Folders.
creator: Brian.Inglis

title: Outgoing email
content:
When I attempt to send an email, I get this pop-up:

Sending of the message failed. An error occurred while sending mail: Outgoing server (SMTP) error. The server responded: impout006.msg.chrl.nc.charter.net cmsmtp 15.181.97.27 blocked. Please see https://www.spectrum.net/support/internet/understanding-email-error-codes for more information. AUP#Out-1130.

My ISP is Spectrum, they said issue is with Thunderbird, incoming s/b 993, outgoing 587, which I confirmed. How can this be fixed?
creator: 22fn6vwdfn
